mil3.1.13:1.2: “Venerable Nāgasena, what is the distinguishing characteristic of mindfulness?”
mil3.1.13:1.3: “Mindfulness, your majesty, has not wavering as a distinguishing characteristic, and also taking up.”
mil3.1.13:1.4: “How, venerable sir, does mindfulness have not wavering as a distinguishing characteristic?”
mil3.1.13:6.1: Distinguishing Characteristic of Mindfulness Question thirteenth
